description:
Fitness influencer Alex Mecum loves to show his fans how he gets that toned sculpted body and that killer ass and his biggest fan Pierce Paris never misses an episode.
When Pierce unexpectedly catches Alex taking a stroll and live streaming in his neighborhood he can’t help but follow him to get a closer look.
This turns in to an episode that Alex’s fans won’t soon forget.
title: Public Figure: Alex Mecum and Pierce Paris RAW
